item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
Now using SourceTypeAction (content aware pipelines) to respond to the document type declaration in the xml instances. So now not restricted to using specific *-locations.html URIs.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Added geoPoint element to DTD v1.2 to allow the recording of Latitude and Longitude co-ordinatess for entries.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Use locationmap for resource resolution. Exposes internal stylesheets as {lm:listLocations.transform.*.*} Thanks to Philippe Perez.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
DTD v1.1 enables use of Common Character Entities.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
DTD v1.1 enables notes to have links.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
Added external DTD v1.0

item.title: code add

code add by DC :
